attributes.action: Stop driving instructors mass booking practical test slots
attributes.additional_details: We don't know who to reach out to as everyone is struggling to get dates and as a student irs adding to our financial and everyday stresses which is not needed. University students like me are trying to get a driving test date and pass so we dont have to go through the trouble we go through everyday to commute to university and get to our part time jobs alongside studying.
attributes.background: Students like me are struggling to find a date for their practical driving test and arguing expected to pay from £400-£1000 which for many of us is hard to do. Finding a test date is becoming harder each day and as we only have two years to pass before our theory expires it's becoming impossible.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions which call for similar actions:

Review process for booking driving tests and ban the resale at inflated prices 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702760

Fund the DVSA to increase the availability of practical driving tests 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/705408
